Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Kalank* and its cast?
Options:
A. a) Madhuri Dixit played the role of Bahaar Begum in *Kalank*.
B. b) Sridevi was originally intended for the role of Bahaar Begum.
C. c) Madhuri Dixit joined the cast of *Kalank* on 31 May 2018.
D. d) The film *Kalank* was released in 2019.
Correct Answer: a) Madhuri Dixit played the role of Bahaar Begum in *Kalank*., c) Madhuri Dixit joined the cast of *Kalank* on 31 May 2018., d) The film *Kalank* was released in 2019.
